title: rAsa kEli vilAsa
sahitya:
rAsa kEli vilAsa prakAsha radhA hrudaya vihAra sarOruha nartana padayugaLa ati sarasa


anupallavi

  bhAsamAna mrugamada tilaka sugandha mandahAsa mukha gOpi mOhana madhusoUdana mani muraLi vAdana


caraNam   prati nava rucirE mangalakara vakSa mandirE pankajA ramaNa ati karunArasa rati raNa shobhita 
mita mrudu bhASita kaumAra karatala tAla sruti laya sagIta sarasa rasa rAsa kalEbhara
virahayuta gOpa vadhUjana vihAra nayana tala padma manOhara sariga sari nIsa nisa rini sadAni 
pada nisa riga muralIdhara sahruda hrudi bhAsa nigraha paridoSa sukruta haladhara sahOdara
